articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Flights to and from UK impacted by air traffic 'technical issue' - Reuters UK
articles.description: Britain's National Air Traffic Service (NATS) was forced to restrict the flow of aircraft on Monday due to a technical issue, it said, with passengers stuck in planes on the tarmac and airlines and airports warning of delays and cancellations.
articles.content: LONDON, Aug 28 (Reuters) - Britain's National Air Traffic Service (NATS) was forced to restrict the flow of aircraft on Monday due to a technical issue, it said, with passengers stuck in planes on th… [+1917 chars]
